price: Andolsun ki içinizden cihad edenlerle sabredenleri belirleyinceye ve haberlerinizi açıklayıncaya kadar sizi imtihan edeceğiz
arabic: وَلَنَبۡلُوَنَّكُمۡ حَتَّىٰ نَعۡلَمَ ٱلۡمُجَٰهِدِينَ مِنكُمۡ وَٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ وَنَبۡلُوَاْ أَخۡبَارَكُمۡ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walanabluwannakum ḥattā naʿlama al-mujāhidīna minkum wal-ṣābirīna wanabluwā akhbārakum
translations: And surely We will test you
